Spider-Man: No Way Home

Rank: 791


With Spider-Man's identity now revealed- Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong- dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.


Director: Jon Watts

Writer: Chris McKenna, Erik Sommers, Stan Lee

Stars: Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch

Tags: Superhero, Supernatural Fantasy, Urban Adventure, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Sci,Fi
